item.title: Just a sister helping her brother out…
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: Party has Megaesophagus, a disease that makes him vomit regularly. Fiesta just tries to help clean up after her big brother!
item.content:encoded: Party has Megaesophagus, a disease that makes him vomit regularly. Fiesta just tries to help clean up after her big brother!

item.title: I kill stuffed things
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: I am a mass murderer of all things stuffed. This is Charli, she is a white Shepard mix who has a compulsion to rip apart every stuffed animal and slowly pull out all of the stuffing, all over the apt.
item.content:encoded:
I am a mass murderer of all things stuffed.

This is Charli, she is a white Shepard mix who has a compulsion to rip apart every stuffed animal and slowly pull out all of the stuffing, all over the apt.

item.title: I am Diesel and I don’t like being groomed.
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: I had my first ever bath at the puppy parlour. I barked the entire time (45 minutes) and was so scared of the hair dryer I had to go home before I was dry.
item.content:encoded: I had my first ever bath at the puppy parlour. I barked the entire time (45 minutes) and was so scared of the hair dryer I had to go home before I was dry.

item.title: Don’t Blame Me
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: OK, point made. Now take this off of me !!
item.content:encoded: OK, point made. Now take this off of me !!

item.title: Max and Cash
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: Destructive boxers ruin $400 pair of eyeglasses.
item.content:encoded: Destructive boxers ruin $400 pair of eyeglasses.

item.title: Wiley shreds his third pillow
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: First there was one pillow missing … I spied it out in the backyard. Shredded. The next day, another pillow. And the third day – this special Christmas pillow in shreds. He thinks he is so clever because he figured out how to take pillows out through the dog door with him! Grrrr.
item.content:encoded: First there was one pillow missing … I spied it out in the backyard. Shredded. The next day, another pillow. And the third day – this special Christmas pillow in shreds. He thinks he is so clever because he figured out how to take pillows out through the dog door with him! Grrrr.

item.title: I LOVE carrots!
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: Most of the carrots in our veggie garden didn’t make it to “adult-hood” because our little Dacshund, Vienna, took it upon herself to daily pull some carrots out and eat them! We often found remnants of carrot around the garden and the house. She LOVES apples too.
item.content:encoded: Most of the carrots in our veggie garden didn’t make it to “adult-hood” because our little Dacshund, Vienna, took it upon herself to daily pull some carrots out and eat them! We often found remnants of carrot around the garden and the house. She LOVES apples too.

item.title: Poopatrator
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: If you can’t find Vito, check the closet. One day we will find out what he does during all of that private time… Sewing a new wardrobe for Frank? Whittling wood into a 200 piece replica of the battle for Middle-Earth? Writing a Pulitzer Prize winning novel? The world may never know…
item.content:encoded: If you can’t find Vito, check the closet. One day we will find out what he does during all of that private time… Sewing a new wardrobe for Frank? Whittling wood into a 200 piece replica of the battle for Middle-Earth? Writing a Pulitzer Prize winning novel? The world may never know…

item.title: Maymo & Penny: Sock Traffickers
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: Maymo the lemon beagle loves his 8 month old sister Penny for trafficking socks from the laundry room to an undisclosed location where he can chew them up and roll on them. For more Maymo and Penny skullduggery, check out Maymo’s Facebook page HERE or YouTube page HERE .
item.content:encoded:
Maymo the lemon beagle loves his 8 month old sister Penny for trafficking socks from the laundry room to an undisclosed location where he can chew them up and roll on them.

For more Maymo and Penny skullduggery, check out Maymo’s Facebook page HERE or YouTube page HERE .

item.title: Green Thief
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: Finn likes to rob the recycling when no one is looking. He is NOT sorry!
item.content:encoded: Finn likes to rob the recycling when no one is looking. He is NOT sorry!
